title: What’s the #1 habit Peter would suggest every person add to their daily regimen?
content:
This AMA Clip is a segment pulled from an “Ask Me Anything” episode of The Drive – AMA #3: supplements, women’s health, patient care, and more. Original release date: 10/29/18.
Become a member to get immediate access to the entire episode and our entire back catalog of AMA podcasts.
<iframe title="What's the #1 habit Peter Attia would suggest every person add to their daily regimen?" width="500" height="281" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EIqd8Jqb6go?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Subscribe on: APPLE PODCASTS | RSS | GOOGLE | OVERCAST | STITCHER

            
            Show NotesPeter not a huge fan of this type of question
The “glib” answer is to:

Sleep well
Do something physical
Don’t eat for a long period
When you do eat, don’t eat crap
Meditate

With that said, “sleep is the one we are going to be most sensitive to”
Lack of good sleep is the one you will “suffer from the quickest”
§
